name: WhatsApp-Forwarder
description: An advanced Telegram to WhatsApp Forwarder

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

API_ID.description: Used to invoke commands, leave blank for default, (dot)

API_HASH.description: Used to invoke sudo commands, leave blank for default

GIT_REPO.description: Must Enter Repository for updater works

REPO_URL.description: Must Enter Repository for updater works

REPO_URL2.description: Must Enter 2nd Repository for updater works

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Go to https://dashboard.heroku.com/account, scroll down and press Reveal API.Required for updater to work.

HEROKU_API_KEY2.description: Go to https://dashboard.heroku.com/account, scroll down and press Reveal API2.Required for updater to work.

SUDO_USERS.description: Users you want to give access to your bot. (Don't allow unknown people)

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The Value of App Name you filled in right on top.Required for updater to work.

HEROKU_APP_NAME2.description: The Value of 2nd App Name you filled in right on top.Required for updater to work.

TZ.description: Required for Correct Time on autopic/get time. Know your timezone from http://www.timezoneconverter.com/cgi-bin/findzone.tzc
